item.title: The most climate-friendly groceries might not be in the supermarket
item.description: The grocery store is the default resource in the U.S. for fresh food

item.title: US retail sales rose slightly in September, adding to months of big gains
item.description: Sales at U.S. retailers and restaurants rose slightly in September as resilient consumers moderated their spending after splurging over the summer

item.title: Best Buy ups sales outlook heading into holiday shopping season
item.description: Best Buy is raising its profit and sales expectations ahead of the holiday shopping season after a strong third quarter

item.title: World shares advance after Wall Street gets a lift from hopes for a Fed rate cut
item.description: European and Asian shares have advanced, following U.S. stocks higher

item.title: Tyson's beef plant closure will impact a reliant town and ranchers nationwide
item.description: Tyson Foodsâ€™ decision to close a beef plant in Lexington, Nebraska, could devastate the small city and undermine the profits of ranchers nationwide
